short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In HN threaded comments, easily see which parent a comment was answering to

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Threaded comments are useful to allow sub-discussions, but they are sometimes difficult to follow: In long and complicated threads, did you ever wonder what was a given comment answering to?

With this extension, when a comment's parent isn't right above, you will see a "show parent" menu item. Just hover your mouse on that item, and the parent that comment was answering to will be shown right above it.

Enjoy!
